articles.title: Rare annular solar eclipse will be viewable in parts of North America next Thursday - CTV News Atlantic
articles.description: A rare annular solar eclipse will be viewable in parts of North America on Thursday, June 10.
articles.content:
HALIFAX -- 
A rare annular solar eclipse will be viewable in parts of North America on Thursday, June 10.

articles.title: US "Suppressing" Chinese Firms: Beijing On Joe Biden's Investment Ban List - NDTV
articles.description: Beijing accused the United States of "suppressing" Chinese firms and issued veiled threats of a retaliation Friday, after President Joe Biden expanded a blacklist of companies Americans are barred from investing in.
articles.content:
China decried the US' blacklist move as a "violation of market law" (File).
